languages.text: "Всем ведомо, сколь вольно ты трактуешь строгие запреты Императора. В слабости сердца ты даришь милосердие не заслуживающим его, не караешь за провинности по всей строгости, не устрашаешь подданных, приводя их в богобоязненный трепет. Ты расточаешь силы и внимание на нужды ничтожных вместо того, чтобы обращать их на служение Ему. Под твоей рукой расцветают опасное вольнодумство и сытая пресыщенность, что скоро вспухнут язвой анархии и декадентства".

"Everyone knows how freely you interpret the strict prohibitions of the Emperor. With a feeble heart, you grant mercy to those who do not deserve it, you do not punish transgressions with the utmost severity, and you do not strike terror into your subjects that will bring them to pious trepidation. You waste your energy and attention on the needs of nonentities instead of turning them to His service. Under your hand, dangerous freethinking and satiety flourish, and will soon swell with the plagues of anarchy and decadence."
languages.original_text: "Всем ведомо, сколь вольно ты трактуешь строгие запреты Императора. В слабости сердца ты даришь милосердие не заслуживающим его, не караешь за провинности по всей строгости, не устрашаешь подданных, приводя их в богобоязненный трепет. Ты расточаешь силы и внимание на нужды ничтожных вместо того, чтобы обращать их на служение Ему. Под твоей рукой расцветают опасное вольнодумство и сытая пресыщенность, что скоро вспухнут язвой анархии и декадентства".

You waste your energy and attention on the needs of nonentities instead of turning them to His service. Under your hand, dangerous freethinking and satiety flourish, and will soon swell with the plagues of anarchy and decadence."

You waste your energy and attention on the needs of nonentities instead of turning them to His service. languages.text: “所有人都很清楚，你会以无比随意的态度，解释帝皇的严令禁止的法令。你心智软弱，愿意宽恕那些根本不值得宽恕的人。你从来不会以最严厉的手段惩罚罪行，也不会用恐怖的手段统治你的臣民，让他们心中充满虔敬。你把过多的精力与注意力浪费在无用之人的需要上，没有指引他们为神皇服务。在你的统治下，危险的自由思想与贪婪在不断扩张，你的王朝很快就会爆发混乱的堕落与叛乱。”
languages.original_text: "Everyone knows how freely you interpret the strict prohibitions of the Emperor. With a feeble heart, you grant mercy to those who do not deserve it, you do not punish transgressions with the utmost severity, and you do not strike terror into your subjects that will bring them to pious trepidation. You waste your energy and attention on the needs of nonentities instead of turning them to His service. Under your hand, dangerous freethinking and satiety flourish, and will soon swell with the plagues of anarchy and decadence."

traits.locale_text: “所有人都很清楚，你会以无比随意的态度，解释帝皇的严令禁止的法令。你心智软弱，愿意宽恕那些根本不值得宽恕的人。你从来不会以最严厉的手段惩罚罪行，也不会用恐怖的手段统治你的臣民，让他们心中充满虔敬。你把过多的精力与注意力浪费在无用之人的需要上，没有指引他们为神皇服务。在你的统治下，危险的自由思想与贪婪在不断扩张，你的王朝很快就会爆发混乱的堕落与叛乱。”

languages.text: «Todo el mundo sabe las libertades que se toma con las prohibiciones más estrictas del Emperador. Su débil corazón otorga clemencia a quienes no la merecen, perdona las transgresiones más severas y no infunde a sus súbditos el terror que les llevaría a la piedad. Malgasta sus energías y su atención en las necesidades de nulidades en vez de en servir al Dios Emperador. Bajo su mandato, el librepensamiento y la saciedad florecen y pronto darán paso a las plagas de la anarquía y la decadencia».
languages.original_text: "Everyone knows how freely you interpret the strict prohibitions of the Emperor. With a feeble heart, you grant mercy to those who do not deserve it, you do not punish transgressions with the utmost severity, and you do not strike terror into your subjects that will bring them to pious trepidation. You waste your energy and attention on the needs of nonentities instead of turning them to His service. Under your hand, dangerous freethinking and satiety flourish, and will soon swell with the plagues of anarchy and decadence."

traits.locale_text: «Todo el mundo sabe las libertades que se toma con las prohibiciones más estrictas del Emperador. Su débil corazón otorga clemencia a quienes no la merecen, perdona las transgresiones más severas y no infunde a sus súbditos el terror que les llevaría a la piedad. Malgasta sus energías y su atención en las necesidades de nulidades en vez de en servir al Dios Emperador. Bajo su mandato, el librepensamiento y la saciedad florecen y pronto darán paso a las plagas de la anarquía y la decadencia».

languages.text: 「皇帝の厳重な禁令を、お前がどれほど自由に解釈しているかは誰もが知っていることだ。お前は弱い心で慈悲に値せぬ者に慈悲を与え、罪を犯した者に最大級の厳罰を与えず、臣民に敬虔な畏れを呼び覚ますような恐怖も与えない。自分のエネルギーと注意を主の奉仕には向けず、取るに足らぬ者へ向けて浪費している。お前の手の下では、危険な自由思想と飽食が栄え、やがて無秩序の疫病と退廃の災いが膨れ上がることだろう」
languages.original_text: "Everyone knows how freely you interpret the strict prohibitions of the Emperor. With a feeble heart, you grant mercy to those who do not deserve it, you do not punish transgressions with the utmost severity, and you do not strike terror into your subjects that will bring them to pious trepidation. You waste your energy and attention on the needs of nonentities instead of turning them to His service. Under your hand, dangerous freethinking and satiety flourish, and will soon swell with the plagues of anarchy and decadence."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝の厳重な禁令を、お前がどれほど自由に解釈しているかは誰もが知っていることだ。お前は弱い心で慈悲に値せぬ者に慈悲を与え、罪を犯した者に最大級の厳罰を与えず、臣民に敬虔な畏れを呼び覚ますような恐怖も与えない。自分のエネルギーと注意を主の奉仕には向けず、取るに足らぬ者へ向けて浪費している。お前の手の下では、危険な自由思想と飽食が栄え、やがて無秩序の疫病と退廃の災いが膨れ上がることだろう」

languages.text: « Tout le monde sait que vous interprétez plutôt librement les interdits pourtant stricts de l'Empereur. Par faiblesse, vous accordez votre miséricorde à ceux qui ne la méritent pas, vous ne punissez pas les transgressions avec la sévérité requise, et vous n'inspirez pas à vos sujets la terreur nécessaire pour les pousser à une pieuse obéissance. Vous gaspillez votre énergie à répondre aux besoins de non-entités plutôt que de vous consacrer uniquement à Le servir. Sous votre règne, les libres penseurs prospèrent, et je suis certaine que nous serons bientôt gangrenés par l'anarchie et la décadence. »
languages.original_text: "Everyone knows how freely you interpret the strict prohibitions of the Emperor. With a feeble heart, you grant mercy to those who do not deserve it, you do not punish transgressions with the utmost severity, and you do not strike terror into your subjects that will bring them to pious trepidation. You waste your energy and attention on the needs of nonentities instead of turning them to His service. Under your hand, dangerous freethinking and satiety flourish, and will soon swell with the plagues of anarchy and decadence."

traits.locale_text: « Tout le monde sait que vous interprétez plutôt librement les interdits pourtant stricts de l'Empereur. Par faiblesse, vous accordez votre miséricorde à ceux qui ne la méritent pas, vous ne punissez pas les transgressions avec la sévérité requise, et vous n'inspirez pas à vos sujets la terreur nécessaire pour les pousser à une pieuse obéissance. Vous gaspillez votre énergie à répondre aux besoins de non-entités plutôt que de vous consacrer uniquement à Le servir. Sous votre règne, les libres penseurs prospèrent, et je suis certaine que nous serons bientôt gangrenés par l'anarchie et la décadence. »

languages.text: "Jeder weiß, wie frei Ihr die strengen Gebote des Imperators auslegt. Mit schwachem Herzen gewährt Ihr jenen Gnade, die sie nicht verdient haben. Ihr bestraft Vergehen nicht mit der gebührenden Härte, und Ihr jagt Euren Untertanen nicht genügend Furcht ein, um sie fromm und züchtig zu machen. Ihr vergeudete Eure Energie und Aufmerksamkeit auf die Bedürfnisse unbedeutender Elemente, anstatt sie in den Dienst des Imperators zu stellen. Unter Eurer Hand erblühen Freidenkerei und Bequemlichkeit, und bald werden die Seuchen der Anarchie und Dekadenz um sich greifen."
languages.original_text: "Everyone knows how freely you interpret the strict prohibitions of the Emperor. With a feeble heart, you grant mercy to those who do not deserve it, you do not punish transgressions with the utmost severity, and you do not strike terror into your subjects that will bring them to pious trepidation. You waste your energy and attention on the needs of nonentities instead of turning them to His service. Under your hand, dangerous freethinking and satiety flourish, and will soon swell with the plagues of anarchy and decadence."

languages.text: "İmparator'un sıkı yasaklarını keyfine göre nasıl eğip büktüğünü cümle âlem biliyor. Yufka yüreğinle hak etmeyenlere merhamet gösterirken yasakları çiğneyenlere en caydırıcı cezaları veremiyorsun. Tebaana gereken dehşeti yaşatamıyor, günah korkusuna nail olmalarını engelliyorsun. Çabalarını ve dikkatini önemsiz kişilere harcıyorsun. Hâlbuki görevin, bu kimseleri O'nun buyruğuna sokmaktır. Eylemlerin, tehlikeli özgür düşüncenin ve hazzın yayılmasına sebep oldu. Yakında da kargaşa ve çöküş denen musibetler baş gösterecek."
languages.original_text: "Everyone knows how freely you interpret the strict prohibitions of the Emperor. With a feeble heart, you grant mercy to those who do not deserve it, you do not punish transgressions with the utmost severity, and you do not strike terror into your subjects that will bring them to pious trepidation. You waste your energy and attention on the needs of nonentities instead of turning them to His service. Under your hand, dangerous freethinking and satiety flourish, and will soon swell with the plagues of anarchy and decadence."
